subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer had lost six of his last seven matches against Novak Djokovic, but in their first meeting on grass, Federer won, 6-3, 3-6, 6-4, 6-3.
snippet: Roger Federer had lost six of his last seven matches against Novak Djokovic, but in their first meeting on grass, Federer won, 6-3, 3-6, 6-4, 6-3.
